parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (11240002) at the end. This strongly suggests electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are mandatory for electoral advertising in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Alina Gorghiu, a candidate for the parliamentary elections, and mentions her political party, PNL.  It directly states "Acestea sunt misiunile mele ca viitor deputat" (These are my missions as a future deputy), clearly linking her to the parliamentary elections. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  It's not a private message; it's public and intended for mass dissemination. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to garner votes for Alina Gorghiu and the PNL. The call to action "Duminică, votați echipa PNL!" (Sunday, vote for the PNL team!) explicitly aims to influence voting behavior. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The content is not journalistic in nature. It lacks objective reporting or analysis. Instead, it promotes Alina Gorghiu's candidacy and her party's platform. It's promotional material, not news.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, presented as a campaign message.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1205923177168461</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Alina Gorghiu), is used during the electoral campaign period (based on the provided dates), has a clear electoral objective (to gain votes), and is targeted at a wide audience via a paid Facebook advertisement. The presence of the CMF number further reinforces this conclusion.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Alina Gorghiu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Entitatea responsabilă de postare], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame electorale plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul postării 1205923177168461, care promovează candidatura Alinei Gorghiu pentru PNL, folosind un mesaj explicit de îndemn la vot ("Duminică, votați echipa PNL!") și un număr CMF (11240002),  având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea candidatei și a partidului său.  Postarea îndeplinește toate criteriile materialului de propagandă electorală conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGEA nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, referindu-se direct la un candidat, fiind utilizată în perioada campaniei electorale (deși perioada este neclară din datele furnizate, se presupune că este după încheierea acesteia), având un obiectiv electoral clar și adresându-se publicului larg prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe o platformă publică.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
